name: Hapless Hero
description:
It's hard for a wizard to find good help these days.   You can't control your hired hapless hero directly, but you can at least open and close chests to guide him through a foreboding a castle to collect a colossal cache of cash.  Watch out for spike pits, skeletons, thieves, golems, and your dumb muscle's own ineptitude.  Take on all 15 levels and grab the gold!

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Cursor
  • Space - Open/Close Treasure Chest
  • Enter - Pause Game
  • Escape - Restart Level

Gamepad Controls:

  • Joystick or D-Pad - Move Cursor
  • X - Open/Close Treasure Chest
  • Start - Pause Game
  • Back - Restart Level

A Team Jumbo Game made by BLK, KitsuneKit and Lexal
